com.taursys.xml
Class Template

java.lang.Object
  |

              +--com.taursys.xml.DocumentElement

                    +--com.taursys.xml.Template
All Implemented Interfaces:
DocumentComponent, MapperComponent
public class Template
extends DocumentElement

A Template is a component used to display multiple items. A Template is a Container which contains other components (eg TextFields). It uses a TemplateRenderer to do the actual rendering. Typically, this involves dispatching a RenderEvent to its children, then cloning itself for each item in its collectionValueHolder.

You can override the createDefaultRender method to use your own custom TemplateRenderer subcomponent if desired.

          Constructs a new template

Method Detail

createDefaultRenderer

protected DocumentElementRenderer createDefaultRenderer()
Creates the default Renderer for this component. By Default this methos returns a new TemplateRenderer. Override this method to define your own TemplateRenderer.
